UW Research Research Centers and Institutes Research Centers and Institutes The University of Washington is known for its strategic, multidisciplinary research. Within our extensive network of Centers and Institutes, UW researchers, staff, and students work across disciplines to extend the boundaries of knowledge. Find a Center or Institute Interested in learning more about focused work in a specific area or finding a collaborator to support your efforts?
